sentences.sentence: Yet he was also a "racialist" who believed in the superiority of the white race.
sentences.translation: 不仅如此，他还是位种族主义者，因为他信奉白种人是最越性的民族。

sentences.sentence: Moreover, O'Connor is not a racialist although she maybe has some kind of racial prejudice.
sentences.translation: 另外，虽然奥康纳不可避免的带有一丝种族偏见，她绝不是种族主义者。
